doc:
Lili Taylor https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lili_Taylor 0 Lili Anne Taylor (born February 20, 1967) is an American actress notable for her appearances in such award-winning indie films as Mystic Pizza (1988), Say Anything... (1989), Dogfight (1991), Short Cuts (1993) and I Shot Andy Warhol (1996), as well as several big-budget films such as Ransom (1996), The Haunting (1999), The Conjuring (2013), Public Enemies (2009) and Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials (2015). In television, she has starred in Six Feet Under, Hemlock Grove, Almost Human and both seasons of the anthology series American Crime; for the latter, she received a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Limited Series or Movie nomination. Lili_Anne_Taylor ( born February_20_,_1967 ) is an_American_actress notable for her_appearances in such_award-winning_indie_films as Mystic_Pizza ( 1988 ) , Say Anything ... ( 1989 ) ,_Dogfight ( 1991 ) , Short_Cuts ( 1993 ) and I Shot Andy_Warhol ( 1996 ) , as_well_as several_big-budget_films such_as Ransom ( 1996 ) , The_Haunting ( 1999 ) , The_Conjuring ( 2013 ) , Public_Enemies ( 2009 ) and_Maze_Runner : The_Scorch_Trials ( 2015 ) . In television , she has_starred in Six_Feet Under , Hemlock_Grove , Almost Human and both_seasons of the_anthology_series_American_Crime ; for the_latter , she received a_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Lead_Actress in a_Limited_Series_or_Movie_nomination .
